hero.tagline: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Software engineer passionate about web design and development, with versatile experience in WordPress as a freelancer and in front and backend frameworks (Vue.js, Spring Boot, Django) in professional environments.
about.description2: Mastery of tools like Git, Docker and SQL, and knowledge in AI-based solutions like ChatGPT, Perplexity and Microsoft Copilot. Focus on developing efficient, accessible and scalable web solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

rocolegal.title: Roco Legal - Modern digital presence for law firm
rocolegal.description: A law firm needed a modern digital presence to reflect professionalism and attract clients. Launched an elegant, bilingual site that builds trust and generates inquiries.

upnext.title: UpNext - Discover movies and series on streaming
upnext.description: UpNext is a web application to discover movies and series and find out which streaming platforms they are available on in Spain. It allows you to save preferences, discard content and receive personalized recommendations to decide what to watch without wasting time.

jlgki.title: JLG K&I - Help organizations transform their knowledge assets into competitive advantages
jlgki.description: Design and development of a WordPress site for JLG K&I, a company that helps organizations transform their knowledge assets into competitive advantages. The site is built with WordPress and is optimized for SEO and speed.

vibrantskin.title: Vibrant Skin - Online Store for Natural Skincare Products
vibrantskin.description: End-to-end design and development of a clean, conversion-oriented Shopify store for natural skincare. Custom Liquid sections, product taxonomy and filters, optimized collections, and mobile-first UX. Configured payments, shipping rules, and email flows. SEO fundamentals (schema, meta, alt), image compression and lazy loading to improve speed.

bandidamezcal.title: Banda - Online Store for Mezcal Drinks
bandidamezcal.description: Design and development of a bold Shopify store for mezcal beverages. Custom product pages with tasting notes, bundle options and age-gate. Localization, tax and shipping setup for MX/US, integration with Mercado Pago/Stripe, and automated emails. Technical SEO and performance optimization across Liquid templates and assets.

reset7.title: RESET7 - Personal Trainer Landing
reset7.description: Complete design and development of the landing page for personal trainer Juancar Garma. Designed from scratch with Elementor, smooth animations and micro-interactions. Implementation of advanced SEO strategy with Yoast, speed optimization and automated marketing campaign with MailerLite.

decos.title: de cos - Online Store for Handcrafted Jute Sandals
decos.description: Migration of online store for handcrafted jute sandals from Prestashop to WordPress with WooCommerce, achieving improvements in performance, customization and security. Implementation of newsletter for customers with news and seasonal discounts.

rockzone.title: Rockzone Camp - Rock Camp Website
rockzone.description: Website for rock camp in Cádiz designed and developed from Hostinger Builder to WordPress, adding functionalities like forms with intelligent logic. Impactful and attractive design thought for children and teenagers.

luciaNails.title: Lucía Nails - Nail and Aesthetics Center
luciaNails.description: Website for nail and aesthetics center designed and developed from WordPress template, completely customized to reflect the unique brand identity. Performance and SEO optimization to ensure speed and good positioning.

vilaLancisV2.title: Vila & Lancis (v2) - Tax, Labor and Accounting Advisory
vilaLancisV2.description: Complete redesign of Vila & Lancis website from scratch with WordPress, improving speed and user experience. Added multilingual support, PageSpeed optimization, SEO work with keyword review and image compression for optimal performance.

vilaLancisV1.title: Vila i Lancis (v1) - Provisional Version
vilaLancisV1.description: Initial version of Vila i Lancis developed with Astro and Resend for emails. Provisional solution while developing the WordPress version, copying existing design and texts due to problems with translations and admin panel access of the previous WordPress.

seiro.title: Software Engineer | Seiro
seiro.description: Design and development of projects in Seiro, a software development and consulting agency. Technologies: Shopify, Liquid, WordPress, Elementor, Vue.js, Flutter, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript.

freelance.title: Freelance WordPress
freelance.description: Design and development of WordPress sites optimized for SEO, speed and conversion. Comprehensive management of hosting, domains and legal compliance (cookies, GDPR). Experience with Astra, Divi, Elementor, child themes, hooks, CSS and JS. Services at rimobyte.com

ithinkupc.title: Software Engineer | iThinkUPC
ithinkupc.description: Design and development of ICT projects for the Polytechnic University of Catalonia: project management, university electoral systems and digital identity management. Technologies: GitLab, Spring Boot, Vue.js, Java, TypeScript, Markdown, Oracle SQL, MongoDB, Jira.

flanks.title: Software Engineer | Flanks
flanks.description: Backend development with Django and scraping in the fintech sector. Client meetings, bank aggregator integration and frontend with Vue.js. Docker and Kubernetes for deployment.

inlabfib.title: Web Developer Intern | inLabFIB
inlabfib.description: Development and maintenance of REST APIs with Django REST Framework. Participation in the maintenance of the FIB intranet (Java Servlets, JSP, JDBC). Development of the final degree project: web application to manage academic stays of foreign students, currently in use (mobility.fib.upc.edu).

computer.title: Computer Engineering Degree
computer.description: Complete training in computer engineering with specialization in software development and systems.

highSchool.title: Scientific Baccalaureate
highSchool.description: Scientific baccalaureate with focus on sciences and mathematics.
